Package test

Class WallSetup

java.lang.Object
test.WallSetup
public class WallSetup
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible for setting up the different brick formations (Wall setup) and types of bricks for each Level in the game.

  • Method Details

    • makeSingleTypeLevel

      private Brick[] makeSingleTypeLevel​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int type)
      This method is used to form the Brick GamePlay for a particular level where only one type of Brick is used.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - drawArea is the Rectangle in which the level is being setup.
      brickCnt - this represents the total number of bricks on the brick wall.
      lineCnt - this represents the number of brick lines on the wall.
      brickSizeRatio - this represents the height to width ratio of a singular brick.
      type - this Integer represents the corresponding level we want to set up.
      Returns:
      Returns an array of type Brick to setup the wall.

    • makeChessboardLevel

      private Brick[] makeChessboardLevel​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int typeA, int typeB)
      This method is used to form the Brick Wall for a particular level where two types of Bricks are being used.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - drawArea is the Rectangle in which the level is being setup.
      brickCnt - this represents the total number of bricks on the brick wall.
      lineCnt - this represents the number of brick lines on the wall.
      brickSizeRatio - this represents the height to width ratio of a singular brick.
      typeA - this represents the first type of Brick being used.
      typeB - this represents the second type of Brick being used.
      Returns:
      Returns an array of Bricks with the different types of bricks to be set up as the Wall above.

    • makeLevels

      private Brick[][] makeLevels​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
      This method initializes all of the different levels we have in the game.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - drawArea is the Rectangle in which the level is being setup.
      brickCount - this represents the total number of bricks on the brick wall.
      lineCount - this represents the number of brick lines on the wall.
      brickDimensionRatio - this represents the height to width ratio of a singular brick.
      Returns:
      Returns Brick[][] type which consists of all the different levels we have in the game which can be accessed by indexing.

    • makeBrick

      private Brick makeBrick​(java.awt.Point point, java.awt.Dimension size, int type)
      This method is used to make any type of brick for the levels.
      Parameters:
      point - Represents the top left coordinate of the rectangle (Brick).
      size - Represents the width and height of the Brick.
      type - Represents the type of brick being used (Clay, Cement, SteeL).
      Returns:
      Returns a Brick type to be created.
